page.title: 15Churches
page.content: There are two Anglican parish churches in the area.St Mary's in the town centre, the old parish church, is still a focus of worship,a reminder of God and centre of care for 4500 parishioners. A dozen healthy organisations cater for all ages.On average some 155 worship on a Sunday,plus children.Over double come to the special christian festivals.The rector,the reverend Phillip Leonard Johnson also welcomes many visitors. Christ Church in Little Drayton serves a population of over 5000 spread over 4000 acres at the Western end of the town.Some of the rural areas are in Moreton Say Parish.
